ResearchProjectDef.label: elixir creation Vol. I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of the Elixir Table, a table made for creating elixirs, and the creation of elixirs using bolt extract as a base.

ResearchProjectDef.label: elixir creation Vol. II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of elixirs using night extract as a base.

ResearchProjectDef.label: elixir creation Vol. III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of elixirs using grave extract as a base.

ResearchProjectDef.label: elixir creation Vol. IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of elixirs using vampiric extract as a base.

ResearchProjectDef.label: elixir creation Vol. V
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of elixirs using spectral extract as a base.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced elixir creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of advanced elixirs using multiple extracts.
